entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BlobBuilder.LinxSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #99266
  • ReadAsync(Memory<char> buffer, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(CancellationToken)) of StreamReader causes AsyncStateMachineBox allocations #99264
  • GC stackwalking crashing on calli with generics #99253
    9.0.0
  • X509Store.Certificates on ARM64 OS does not return certificates on hardware keys #99250
    Future
  • `dotnet` segfaults after scripted install #99249
  • Excluding a library from interpreter would result in a crash #99248
  • BlobBuilder.ReserveBytes needs to zero the memory #99244
  • Consider improvements for OpenSSL chain building performance #99242
    Future
  • Mono WASM PInvoke Table generation does not handle backticks #99241
    9.0.0
  • Application.ProductVersion in .NET 8.0.201 returns incorrect value in Windows 11 and c#. #99235
  • Consider using file extension for WASM ICU data files that is less likely to be blocked by firewalls (not .dat) #99231
    9.0.0
  • JsonElement.GetInt32() fails when working with JsonElement directly #99229
  • NET8 WcfClient (net-tcp binding) running on linux cannot be authenticated on WCF Server hosted on windows if UseManagedNtlm is set #99227
  • `AssemblyBuilderAccess` has no `Save` enum and `RunAndSave` enum #99224
  • [wasm] VFS/common WasmApp properties ignored in wasmbrowser template #99223
    9.0.0
  • Localization issue with dates in Basque (eu-ES) in Blazor .NET 8 #99222
  • > Should CA1820 be removed when all these changes defeat its perf improvement reasoning? #99219
  • Configure the certificate valiation from the environment variable #99217

Closed

  • [Wasm][Perf] Wasm Wasm BDN perf tests are failing to build with top level stack overflow. #98334
  • [wasm] MonoProxy throws System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute. #95019
  • WriteXorExecute is not working in combination with PerfMaps #97765
    9.0.0
  • Test failure in Interop workitem: Assert failure !"About to FailFast. set DOTNET_AssertOnFailFast=0 if this is expected" #99133
    9.0.0
  • Possible memory leak with Native Host API #98995
  • Test failure: Assertion failed 'Cloning of node not supported' in '(dynamicClass):IL_STUB_PInvoke(int,byref):long' during 'Morph - Global' #99214
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: [JsonSourceGenerationOptions(DefaultIgnoreCondition = JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull)] fails with string type prop #99202
  • Improve regex source generator optimization collision between alternations and repetitions #98683
    9.0.0
  • Question about Dictionary<TKey, TValue> reading order #99220
  • SPMI: Also display perfscore improvements/regressions separately #98799
    9.0.0
  • [aot] Library tests failures on Windows, assertion `elems <= MAX_VECTOR_ELEMS / 2' not met #98099
  • Can cross-platform cross-compilation be achieved in .net9.0 #99152
  • Incorrect caching of VA sig cookies used in dynamic methods #13221
    Future
  • Edit and Continue needs code review on adding methods codepath #13279
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ILLink/ILCompiler support for feature checks #99267
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix extra stack frame on exception stack trace #99263
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix stack walking for new EH #99262
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Skip EventSource tests if process is not elevated #99261
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix Promise cancelation race condition #99259
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Remove INS_SCALABLE_OPTS_SHIFT #99258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GC stackwalking for generic calli #99257
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [debugproxy] Invoke CDP endpoint to report error to telemetry #99254
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable building cross components from linux-arm64 #99252
    area-Infrastructure
  • Pass --target in preprocess_file() #99251
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BP_1A to BQ_2B, BU_2A #99245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [ws] Fix debugging web socket JS code + add test #99240
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Expand flow graph debug checking #99238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Consolidate block scaling logic #99234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Remove redundant check for DivideByZeroException for unsigned division/modulo #99228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [LoongArch64] Remove the redundant check of DivideByZeroException for GT_UDIV/GT_UMOD in CodeGen::genCodeForDivMod(). #99215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64

Merged

  • Implement Swift's physical lowering pass in the managed type system #98831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add more RuntimeTestMode options for the XUnitWrapperGenerator #99174
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix a couple .NET 9 testing issues in the SOS tests in the diagnostics repo #99255
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove PgoSuffix from Microsoft.NETCore.App.Crossgen2.sfxproj #99246
    area-Infrastructure
  • Further special-case arrays in Enumerable.Chunk #99256
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] R2RDump to handle System.Private.CoreLib #98849
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Delete dead `FEATURE_READONLY_GS_COOKIE` support for Apple #99225
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove single quotes around experiment name #99260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix PInvokeCalliFrame::UpdateRegDisplay on x86 #99247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle GT_SWIFT_ERROR in gtCloneExpr #99236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle GT_SWIFT_ERROR in GenTree::Compare #99237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JitDump for missing string #99094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch System.Linq to using `is null` consistently #99239
    area-System.Linq
  • Remove RuntimeIdentifiers from Microsoft.NETCore.App.Crossgen2.sfxproj #98956
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the local morph quirk with block locals #99209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Iterator<T>.TryGetFirst in Enumerable.Any() #99218
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Improve alternation switch optimization in regex source generator #98723
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Use new MacOS arm64 pool for official builds" #99213
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SPMI: Project out fields for diffs information #99226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Fix some more SPMI report PerfScore edge cases #99230
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AW_2A to AZ_2A, BM_1A, BN_1A #99211
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Bump _WIN32_WINNT to align with coreclr #99160
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Support subtraction in scalar evolution #99154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Expand PerfScore output #99158
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Liveness and UpperVector Save/Restore #99093
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Remove or document Unsafe.AsPointer uses in core libraries #99146
    area-System.Memory
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() should respect [ActivatorUtilitiesConstructor] #99175
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Delete stackwalk cache #99137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm] Disable the System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript tests on mt whi…" #99000
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI test #99201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Debug RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #98981
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Test on CI #99042
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] OSR: Fix initReg usage in genPushCalleeSavedRegisters #99156
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ILCompiler: support publishing using a non-portable ILCompiler build. #99148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Try every ip address on host connection #99204
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • DivRem 64by32 and 32by16 refactor in Decimal.DecCalc #99196
    area-System.Numerics
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Do not contain out-of-bounds local addresses #99195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #95990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Avoid generating (most) thunks #99208
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][aot] Add a 'compile-in-child' AOT argument #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reconsider including BOM in templates #39187
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
  • [NETSDKE2E] Fail to load mstest project with NET 9 preview.2 SDK installed. #39168

Closed

  • Using the new `--mode` parameter of `dotnet workload update` throws a nullref exception #38078
  • You must install or update .NET to run this application repeatedly error returns after repair steps . #38999

PullRequests

Created

  • Hide workload update message Fixes #37520 #39185
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove the System.Drawing.Common dependency #39108
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Disable package aliasing tests #39183
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include CodeStyle targets files even when not enforcing code style in build #38968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable package aliasing tests #39144
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Move Service worker to static web assets in preparation for compressing and fingerprinting everything #39177
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Trim trailing .git from sourcelink repo urls in container generation #39161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Open issue: relax requirement that type be enumerable to participate in collection expressions #7744
  • Collection expression loophole: ability to invoke .Add() method with the parameter type not matching the collection expression element type #7724
  • [Proposal]: Field and value as contextual keywords #7964
  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Freshly created editorconfig gets duplicated rules added when file is open in VS #72382
  • Implement interfaces code fix does not implement protected interface members non-explicitly #72380
  • INamedTypeSymbol.StaticConstructors is empty for metadata types #72379
  • VisitObjectInitializerExpression throws InvalidCastException on invalid VisualBasic expression #72378

PullRequests

Created

  • Bind `allows` constraint clause #72386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Rename a few incorrect IDS_ entries #72385
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10
  • Remove the 'Compilation Available' tagger event source #72384
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Better BlobBuilder pooling #72383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable `lock` in async method #72381
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Support parsing for `allows` constraint #72346
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces

Updated

  • Check PublishData.json feeds #72333
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Small allocation optimization in StateTable.Builder.ToImmutable #72364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delay create the SkeletonReferenceCache #72365
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Roslyn non-source-only build fixes #72360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update PublishData for VS 17.10P2 snap #72351
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce closure and Lazy allocations inside CSharpCompilation.ctor #72371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Patterns: Allow non-negative and full integer sets to merge (intersect or union) #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve behavior of SyntaxRemoveOptions.AddElasticMarker #72255
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Razor internals #71762
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Attempt at reducing the file I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder. #72377
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Incorporate underlying type's hierarchy into overload resolution #72155
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make Workspaces.MSBuild build with a netstandard target #72257
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dependabot npm registry url is incorrect #54360
  • Unable to use JS Initializer for custom boot resource loader #54358
  • QuickGrid - Expose way to Hide Column Options #54357
  • [OpenIdConnect] ability to specify a different certificate at runtime, based on scope service #54356
  • Investigate Blazor WebAssembly startup performance characteristics #54353
  • TestHost keep the test running infinitely #54347
  • SignalR redis perf : consider sharded pub/sub when available #54344
  • Memory Leak in HostingApplication/WebApplication during integrationtest #54342
  • [feat] Add `PasswordOptions.RequireLetter` #54341
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #54337

Closed

  • [Blazor] Add lighthouse score to automated perf tests #29303
    9.0-preview3
  • [Epic] SignalR should have a C++ client #5301
    7.0.0
  • [9.0-preview.1] Request Delegate Generator emits nullable annotations when Nullable Reference Types not enabled #54020
    9.0-preview3
  • Request delegate generator produces CS8073 for ValueTask<T?> results #54172
    Backlog
  • API response details are not shown in swagger when using WithOpenApi() method with OpenApiOperation copy constructor #43707
    7.0.0
  • Vulnerability on mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:6.0 image (Digest:sha256:894c9f49ae9a72b64e61ef6071a33b6b616d0cf48ef25c83c4cf26d185f37565) #54283
  • FormFeature initialized with an IFormCollection instance throws NullReferenceException in Form property getter #53099
  • Add InternalServerError and InternalServerError<T> to TypedResults #53073
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #54336
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmStandaloneTemplate_Works #47225
    9.0-preview1
  • Doc comments: Explain UserName is a unique login identity and different from User.Name #5721
    Backlog
  • Quarantine CounterPageCanUseThreads #53723
    9.0-preview3
  • Option to serve WebAssembly app with multithreading #54071
    9.0-preview3
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54323
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #54303
  • UserManager.CreateUser throws "sequence contains more than one element" when options.User.RequireUniqueEmail = true; #53074
  • MVC stoped working after update to 8.0.0.2 #54193

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix dependabot `npm-registry` url #54362
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Bump Microsoft.OpenApi dependency version #54361
    area-infrastructure
  • Ability to run E2E tests on WebAssembly multithreaded runtime #54351
    area-mvc
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24153.2 #54345
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix test CanRenderLargeComponentsWithServerRenderMode #54340
    area-blazor
  • Experimentally unquarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54339
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *

Merged

  • Fix nullability context handling in RDG #54354
    area-minimal
  • Ensure key creation time is no later than key activation time #54299
    area-dataprotection
  • Throw if the default key is revoked #54278
    area-dataprotection
  • Fixed source generator endpoint delegate handling for nullable scenarios #54335
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Prefer keys old enough to have propagated #54309
    area-dataprotection
  • Update TestRazorCompiledItem.cs #54211
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Handle parameters in Accepts mediatypes in DefaultProblemDetailsWriter #54158
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview3
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview3
  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview3
  • [Blazor] ChangeDetection.cs - typo in comments (EventCallBack => EventCallback) #54333
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix CanUseFocusExtensionToFocusElementPreventScroll #54343
    area-blazor
  • Unquarantine CounterPageCanUseThreads. Fixes #53723 #54338
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] RenderTreeDiffBuilderTest - typo (EventCallBack) #54334
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure
  • Match arguments and property names in UserLoginInfo #54298
    area-identity
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-04
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Improve how dotnet-counters shows/truncates attributes #4539

Merged

  • added new command to dump all active incoming http requests #4536

Updated

  • feat: dumphttp command initial implementation #4488

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CascadeInputTransparent="False" still not working on ContentView #21002
  • CollectionView on main is broken on WIndows #21001
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Windows] Better document TitleBar customizations with windows and possible provide samples #20999
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Custom IDrawable control does not databind to a model property when used inside a CollectionView ItemTemplate #20991
    Backlog
  • Issue with the usage of DynamicResource for inner views of a custom control. #20990
    Backlog
  • Crash when app is deployed with dotnet publish #20981
  • WebAuthenticator in PlatformIntegrationDemo ends (crashes?) App #20980
  • Android performance issues comparing a float for resizing a AbsoluteLayout #20979
  • [Android, CollectionView] CV duplicates item after moving #20977
    Backlog
  • Windows TitleBar is now permanently transparent showing things underneath (.NET8), did not have this issue before (.NET7) #20976
  • error MSB6006: "java.exe" exited with code 1, happens all the time. Rebuild works fine. #20975

Closed

  • <Border /> property is not working while I write <Label /> property and passing a Text="", text is not being shown in the android emulator. #20944
  • on iOS, a control derived from Entry does not display the same of Entry #20951
  • [Winui3] Upgrade to .net 8 and then the AppTitleBar can't be dragged #20985
  • [Android] - the last characters clipped in the Label with the "Italic" property #20809
  • FilePicker Does not show in Mac Catalyst #20994
    Backlog
  • Add a cancel event and/or command to the MAUI SearchBar control #20946
  • Ability to check whether a specific navigation route has been registered #20984
  • Colour for ScrollBar in ScrollView #20986
  • Latest update to Visual Studio for Mac breaks CollectionView #15189
  • ColumnDefinition with * inconsistent #15757
    Backlog
  • TabbedPage inside Grid works in debug mode, but throws exception in release mode #16326
  • not work scroll to end listview #16455
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Lottie animation does not behave as expected inside CollectionView.EmptyView #16584
    Backlog
  • W2DStringSizeService use DrawBounds as text size is not compatible with iOS and Android. #14988
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Double dash in Entry or Editor crashes the app if iOS device has Smart Punctuation turned on #20439
    Backlog
  • Issue when using BindableLayout and Entry/Editor with special characters #19954
  • How to update label inside Shell.FlyoutHeaderTemplate in MAUI .net 7.0 #17873
  • netframe 4.8.1 funktionirt nicht . #20720
  • Hot Reload Button issue #20945
  • App is crashing in IOS after installing from testflight #20960
  • Can't see wireless connected device for iOS #20958
  • How can I use '--disable-web-security' #20969
  • MethodName(out IntPtr variableName) send null values for out parameter from the iOS Binding dll in .NET 8 #20978

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a different gif URL as MS News blocked us #21003
  • Don't remeasure the HScrollView during the layout pass #20998
  • [CI] Add image override to APIScan pool. #20997
  • [iOS] Fix gestures not working on Button #20988
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button, area/gestures
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/iOS 🍎, control-window
  • Update the macios dependencies to new package names. #20982
    platform/macOS 🍏
  • [Android] Fixed border inside frame not rendering #20974
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border

Merged

  • [CI] Move to a pool dedicate just for APIScan. #20996
  • [net9.0] Update net9.0 with release versions #20983
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer return actual detected directions #20619
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [iOS] Double dash in input field crash fix #20584
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Update layout.md #20964
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Android] System Fonts fix #20961
    platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨
  • Clear logcat and set to a larger size #20732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Document ICanvas #20881
    area/docs 📓
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Add scrolling tests for virtualization w/ Datatemplates #20954
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • [Android] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [Android] Span line height fix #20352
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.5 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Win] Double tap behavior #20870
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Enable now passing tests and add some TableView categories #20531
    area/testing, area/ListView
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Unified Build control update #14418

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #18863
  • Update README.md #18862

Merged

  • Update arcade and add support for --build-tests switch #18464
  • Update Assembly Exclusions #18859
  • Update HostRid default to be in line with Host/Target architecture props #18861
  • Add build mode to VMR build log #18860
  • Update SDK diff baseline #18858

Updated

  • Pass TargetRid to Razor's build for the VMR #18843
  • Binary tooling #18726
  • Installer updates (Merge to SDK Changeset) #17959
  • Rebootstrap SB SDK/artifacts #18763
  • Add SdkArchiveDiff task to verify the sdk archive has all the expected files #18748
